name: Deploying to Heroku ⚡️ Bolt for JavaScript
description: This is a Slack app built with the Bolt for JavaScript framework that showcases deploying to the Heroku platform.

SLACK_SIGNING_SECRET.description: Slack creates a unique string for your app and shares it with you. Verify requests from Slack with confidence by verifying signatures using your signing secret.

SLACK_BOT_TOKEN.description: Bot tokens represent a bot associated with the app installed in a workspace. Unlike user tokens, they're not tied to a user's identity; they're just tied to your app. Begins with 'xoxb-'.

APP_BASE.description: Do not change. Used by heroku-buildpack-monorepo
